title.rendered: MYR Group Inc. to Attend UBS and Sidoti Virtual Investor Conferences in March

content.rendered:
PDF Version

HENDERSON, Colo., March 16, 2022 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) — MYR Group Inc. (“MYR Group”) (NASDAQ: MYRG), a holding company of leading specialty contractors serving the electric utility infrastructure, commercial and industrial construction markets in the United States and Canada, announced it will attend the UBS and Sidoti & Company virtual investor conferences. MYR Group’s Chief Executive Officer, Rick Swartz, and Chief Financial Officer, Betty Johnson, will virtually meet with institutional investors during the UBS 16th Annual Engineering, Infrastructure, and Construction conference on Tuesday, March 22, 2022. This event is only available to UBS clients. They will also virtually meet with institutional investors during Sidoti & Company’s Virtual Small Cap conference on Wednesday, March 23 and Thursday, March 24, 2022. This event is only available to Sidoti clients.

About MYR Group Inc.
MYR Group is a holding company of leading specialty contractors serving the electric utility infrastructure, commercial and industrial construction markets throughout the United States and Canada who have the experience and expertise to complete electrical installations of any type and size. Their comprehensive services on electric transmission and distribution networks and substation facilities include design, engineering, procurement, construction, upgrade, maintenance and repair services. Transmission and distribution customers include investor-owned utilities, cooperatives, private developers, government-funded utilities, independent power producers, independent transmission companies, industrial facility owners and other contractors. Commercial and industrial electrical contracting services are provided to general contractors, commercial and industrial facility owners, local governments and developers. For more information, visit exiinc.com.
